title: Suryoday Small Finance Bank Ltd leads gainers in A group - Business Standard
content: Suryoday Small Finance Bank Ltd leads gainers in A group  Business Standard
description: Housing Development Finance Corporation Ltd, Edelweiss Financial Services Ltd, Garden Reach Shipbuilders & Engineers Ltd and HDFC Bank Ltd are among the other gainers in the BSE's 'A' group today, 04 April 2022.
